properties.title: Complex Types to COBOL Structures Generator
properties.author: Fady Moussallam

release.description: New Java to Cobol Structures Generator
release.action: A new j2sc Ant task takes standard Java classes as input and generates COBOL-annotated XML schemas. This is an alternative to the xsdc Ant task that takes XML schema or WSDL as input.
First version of the XML Schema annotator.
